name: Muffin Tin Customizable Veggie Egg Cups 🥗
description: These muffin tin egg cups are the perfect way to start your day. They're easy to make, and you can customize them with your favorite veggies and cheese!
instructions: In a greased muffin tin, place your desired combination of fillings into each muffin cup.
In a measuring cup, add salt and pepper to eggs and beat the eggs until smooth.
Season each cup with salt and pepper.
Pour the beaten eggs into each muffin cup until the liquid almost reaches the top.
Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 20 minutes, until set.
